column1: Little Goat Diner////When we arrived at the restaurant
column2: it was close to peak brunch time
column3: and we suffered the consequences! The place was packed and even the foyer was chock full of eager patrons. We were given an approximate wait time of 1 hour. After putting ourselves on the waitlist
column4: we headed to Bombobar across the street and a nearby coffee shop to occupy ourselves in the meantime. (I will say that the automated waiting system that notifies you when your table is ready is fantastic.)
